blog.description: 24, just a regular straight chilean geeky guy who likes comics, movies, video games, mlp, wild cards and do drawings and animations. also i love brony bacon , the brony community will understand what do i mean ;). and i reaaaaaally have a soft spot for martial arts comics; besides being an animation student, im an aspiring screenwriter, anti-sjw to the bone. Sometimes NSFW, if you want to see my full NSFW Blog, just ask nicely

summary: Just take my hand, there's no time to waste on giving up
title: Just take my hand, there's no time to waste on giving up
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2w4rtYl

by Melusine11

Ben had once seen Rey cut down a pair of assassins nearly twice her size, but to behold her, in her Leia Organa approved Jedi attire, saberstaff safely and strategically hidden from sight, she tended to look more like his consort than his bodyguard. He was pretty sure her actual status was a heated debate topic in the senate when they weren’t around. Because to give the wiry Jedi Master an incorrect address was sure to net the speaker a reckoning from Senator Ben Organa-Solo himself, and an intergalactic scandal to go along with it.

Or the one in which Jedi Rey knows exactly what she wants, Senator Ben is a self sabotaging idiot, and Uncle Luke needs to come and knock some sense into him.

Words: 1286, Chapters: ¼, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Rey (Star Wars), Ben Solo, Leia Organa, Luke Skywalker
  • Relationships: Rey/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren
  • Additional Tags: Senator Ben Solo, Jedi Rey, Angst, Mutual Pining, Forbidden Love, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2w4rtYl

tags: star wars episode i: the phantom menace
i don't know who you are
but i will find you and i will kill you
summary: I can't believe Qui Gon/Aslan is the "I don't know who you are, but I will find you and I will kill you" guy XD And it all...
body:
I can’t believe Qui Gon/Aslan is the “I don’t know who you are, but I will find you and I will kill you” guy XD

And it all started when I was supposed to search for the other famous Liam (O'Brien, because Vayne Aurelius) I know in TV Tropes, but ended up opening the link of the first Liam (Neeson) in the search results nonetheless :P

reblog.comment:

summary: I decided not to delete my blog for now
body:
I decided not to delete my blog for now

Okay I’m going to try pulling this blog back up to what it once was. I won’t be super active for a while but hopefully I can get back in the swing of things. If we have any old threads you want me to pick back up on just let me know otherwise I probably won’t try to pick it back up unless I really liked it a lot. For now I’m just going to post some meme questions and go from there.

blog.name: ironwothan
blog.title: IRON WOTHAN
blog.description: Doing Whatever It Takes To Grow

summary: For a long time now, I have wanted a tattoo with the Rebel Star Bird from Star Wars, but it needed something else. To those of...
caption:
For a long time now, I have wanted a tattoo with the Rebel Star Bird from Star Wars, but it needed something else. To those of you that don’t know, Star Wars is very much an autistic special focus of mine, something that I have been nearly obsessed with since 1995. 

Science fiction generally has been a fascination of mine as well, and I have long been consuming as much of it as possible. Little less than a year ago, a dear friend pointed me to Ann Leckie’s novel “Ancillary Justice”, and once again my brain was alive with wonder and delight. So few things ever move me like The Imperial Radch Trilogy did (to the point that I have read all three books in the series seven times this year).

While the Star Bird is recognizable to many of you, the symbol superimposed and trailing underneath is the emination “Esk”, which is very closely related to the main character of the series. It stands for “beginning” (while it’s opposite, “Var” means “ending”). 

This is my second tattoo and I couldn’t be happier with the initial results!

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina
